This test checks that changing the transform on an element triggers a correct invalidation.
The paint invalidations below should match the transformed element's coordinates.
Tested locations: 1200,1500
{
  "bounds": [1600, 585],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [1600, 585],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "repaintRects": [
        [1500, 0, 100, 100],
        [1300, 0, 300, 585],
        [1200, 0, 100, 100],
        [1200, 0, 100, 100],
        [1000, 0, 300, 585],
        [900, 0, 100, 100]
      ]
    }
  ]
}
